title: Where less than 50% area of such plot / plots falls within NMRC, these regulations including FSI shall be applicable to the part of plot / plots falling within NMRC, whereas for the part of plot / plots falling outside NMRC, these regulations except provisions regarding FSI shall be applicable
clause_text: Where less than 50% area of such plot / plots falls within NMRC, these regulations including FSI shall be applicable to the part of plot / plots falling within NMRC, whereas for the part of plot / plots falling outside NMRC, these regulations except provisions regarding FSI shall be applicable. The FSI permissible for the part falling outside NMRC shall be as mentioned in chapter 6.
section: Impact Assessment and Integrated Mobility Plan

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
